name: Tiny Dry Planet
description:
"This planet is too small for all of us".

- KEEP THE BUTTON PRESSED FOLLOWING THE RYTHM TO MAKE YOUR ROOT GROW AND REACH THE WATER
- WATCH OUT WITH THE GROUND RINGS!
- GET THREE DROPS TO GET FULLY HYDRATED AND WIN


 In Tiny Dry Planet, you have to compete for survivor with the other 3 tree inhabitants. Water is an scarce resource, so you must use your roots to reach the water, following the loving music beat.

Get fully hydrated and win!
